entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43104
  • [dotnet format] Different whitespace errors reported by --verify-no-changes when using indent_style = tab #43098
  • Movement of clauses in an inheritance #43095
  • dotnet tool update did not install the latest version #43089
  • [feature request] A way to compile and run raw `.cs` files from CLI (maybe extending `dotnet run`) in one-shot command #43086
  • Better suggestion for erroneous `dotnet new gitconfig` #43084
  • `dotnet build` ignores `/v` verbosity flag in .NET 9.0.0-preview.7 #43069

Closed

  • SDK commands like `restore` `build` and `list` incorrectly warn about vulnerable NuGet packages hoisted by the shared runtime #43063

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #43103
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43102
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #43101
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Improve Up to date check logic #43100
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43099
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add basic guidelines for telemetry usage for tooling authors #43097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Search version in set #43096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.403 #43094
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.110 #43092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.427 #43091
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.135 #43090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.306 #43093
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --source for global/path tool install #42965
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Document for new feature, 9.0.1xx
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #43071
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Handle --list-tests in dotnet test #43058
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • VMR: Exit when error happens in Prepare BuildLogs step #43068
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43052
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, consider-for-documentation, 9.0.1xx
